verses.verse: The <S%G602>Revelation<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> Him to <S%G1166>show<s%> to His bond-servants, the things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G5034>shortly<s%> <S%G1096>take<s%> <S%G1096>place;<s%> and He <S%G649>sent<s%> and <S%G4591>communicated<s%> [it] by His <S%G32>angel<s%> to His bond-servant <S%G2491>John,<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G3140>bore<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> to the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and to the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> [even] to <S%G3745>all<s%> that he <S%G3708>saw.<s%>

<S%G3107>Blessed<s%> is he who <S%G314>reads<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G3056>words<s%> of the <S%G4394>prophecy,<s%> and <S%G5083>heed<s%> the things which are <S%G1125>written<s%> in it; for the <S%G2540>time<s%> is <S%G1451>near.<s%>

<S%G2491>John<s%> to the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1577>churches<s%> that are in <S%G773>Asia:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> to you and <S%G1515>peace,<s%> from Him who is and who was and who is to <S%G2064>come;<s%> and from the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4151>Spirits<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> are <S%G1799>before<s%> His <S%G2362>throne;<s%>

and from <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3144>witness,<s%> the first-born of the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and the <S%G758>ruler<s%> of the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth.<s%> To Him who <S%G25>loves<s%> us, and <S%G3089>released<s%> us from our <S%G266>sins<s%> by His <S%G129>blood,<s%>

and He has <S%G4160>made<s%> us [to be] a <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> <S%G2409>priests<s%> to His <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G3962>Father;<s%> to Him [be] the <S%G1391>glory<s%> and the <S%G2904>dominion<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> He is <S%G2064>coming<s%> with the <S%G3507>clouds,<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3788>eye<s%> will <S%G3708>see<s%> Him, <S%G2532>even<s%> those <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G1574>pierced<s%> Him; and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5443>tribes<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> will <S%G2875>mourn<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> Him. <S%G3483>Even<s%> <S%G3483>so.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

" I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G7008>Alpha<s%> and the <S%G5598>Omega<s%> ," <S%G3004>says<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> "who is and <S%G3588>who<s%> was and who is to <S%G2064>come,<s%> the <S%G3841>Almighty.<s%>"

I, <S%G2491>John,<s%> your <S%G80>brother<s%> and <S%G4791>fellow<s%> <S%G4791>partaker<s%> in the <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> and <S%G932>kingdom<s%> and <S%G5281>perseverance<s%> [which are] in <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> was on the <S%G3520>island<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G3963>Patmos,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

I was in the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> on the Lord's <S%G2250>day,<s%> and I <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3694>behind<s%> me a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> [the sound] of a <S%G4536>trumpet,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1125>"Write<s%> in a <S%G975>book<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> you <S%G991>see,<s%> and <S%G3992>send<s%> [it] to the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1577>churches:<s%> to <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%> and to <S%G4667>Smyrna<s%> and to <S%G4010>Pergamum<s%> and to <S%G2363>Thyatira<s%> and to <S%G4554>Sardis<s%> and to <S%G5359>Philadelphia<s%> and to <S%G2993>Laodicea.<s%>"

And I <S%G1994>turned<s%> to <S%G991>see<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> that was <S%G2980>speaking<s%> with me. And having <S%G1994>turned<s%> I <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G3087>lampstands;<s%>

and in the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of the <S%G3087>lampstands<s%> <S%G3664>one<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G1746>clothed<s%> in a <S%G4158>robe<s%> <S%G4158>reaching<s%> to the <S%G4158>feet,<s%> and <S%G4024>girded<s%> <S%G4314>across<s%> His <S%G3149>breast<s%> with a <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G2223>girdle.<s%>

And His <S%G2776>head<s%> and His <S%G2359>hair<s%> were <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2053>wool,<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G5510>snow;<s%> and His <S%G3788>eyes<s%> were <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G5395>flame<s%> of <S%G4442>fire;<s%>

and His <S%G4228>feet<s%> [were] <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G5474>burnished<s%> <S%G5474>bronze,<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> it has been <S%G4448>caused<s%> to <S%G4448>glow<s%> in a <S%G2575>furnace,<s%> and His <S%G5456>voice<s%> [was] <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G5456>sound<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5204>waters.<s%>

And in His <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> He <S%G2192>held<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G792>stars;<s%> and out of His <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G1607>came<s%> a <S%G3691>sharp<s%> two-edged <S%G4501>sword;<s%> and His <S%G3799>face<s%> was <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> <S%G5316>shining<s%> in its <S%G1411>strength.<s%>

And <S%G3753>when<s%> I <S%G3708>saw<s%> Him, I <S%G4098>fell<s%> at His <S%G4228>feet<s%> as a <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G3498>man.<s%> And He <S%G5087>laid<s%> His <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hand<s%> upon me, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Do not be <S%G5399>afraid;<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> and the <S%G2078>last,<s%>

and the <S%G2198>living<s%> One; and I was <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G2198>alive<s%> <S%G165>forevermore,<s%> and I <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G2807>keys<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> and of <S%G86>Hades.<s%>

<S%G1125>"Write<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G3708>seen,<s%> and the things <S%G3739>which<s%> are, and the things <S%G3739>which<s%> shall <S%G1096>take<s%> <S%G1096>place<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things.<s%>

"As for the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G792>stars<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G3708>saw<s%> in My <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hand,<s%> and the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G3087>lampstands:<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G792>stars<s%> are the <S%G32>angels<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1577>churches,<s%> and the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G3087>lampstands<s%> are the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1577>churches.<s%>
